Felwithe--A city of great majesty and populated with citizens of high intelligence and moral standards. It was at the gates of this great city that I was orphaned.

I knew not my parents and, lacking guidance, I ventured into the city. After wandering around for a few minutes, I politely asked for directions to the Enchanters guild so that I may begin my life on Norrath properly equipped.

Almost immediately, an enchantress not only escorted me to my guild but bestowed upon me the sum of 157 platinum pieces to aid me in my travels. Alas, I have long since forgotten her name.

I then ventured into the woods of Greater Faydark where I spent 6 seasons killing the creatures that abound there.

My future, which was destined to become a jeweler was started during that time.

After 6 seasons, I tired of the incessant buying and selling in the zone and purchased a teleport to North Karana. From there, I ran to Qenyos and have lived (and died) in the Karanas since that time.

In the ensuing 17 seasons, I have flourished and become a Master at Jewelcraft and Pottery so that I may be of some assistance to my friends and new family.

Charismata
Master Jeweler
Master Potter
